blog.name: actonart
blog.title: ActonArt Drawing School
blog.description: ActonArt is a drawing and fine art studio school offering instruction to children, teens and adults. Core skill drawing instruction is the foundation of our program while specialty classes are offered in painting, sculpting, mixed media, Manga, fashion, figure drawing and more.

Trans Girl, Asexual, Let's try out She/Her pronouns.
I don't have the memory to promise I can tag your triggers, but I'm willing to try!
If I get something wrong, feel free to let me know!

summary: I’ve seen the Detective Pikachu trailer twice. I know what Pikachu sounds like. And yet Every time I see a gif or a screencap...
body:
I’ve seen the Detective Pikachu trailer twice. I know what Pikachu sounds like.

And yet

Every time I see a gif or a screencap with subtitles, the Pikachu in my head sounds exactly like Rocket Raccoon.

reblog.comment:
I’ve seen the Detective Pikachu trailer twice. I know what Pikachu sounds like.

And yet

Every time I see a gif or a screencap with subtitles, the Pikachu in my head sounds exactly like Rocket Raccoon.

trail.content_raw:
I’ve seen the Detective Pikachu trailer twice. I know what Pikachu sounds like.

And yet

Every time I see a gif or a screencap with subtitles, the Pikachu in my head sounds exactly like Rocket Raccoon.
trail.content:
I’ve seen the Detective Pikachu trailer twice. I know what Pikachu sounds like.

And yet

Every time I see a gif or a screencap with subtitles, the Pikachu in my head sounds exactly like Rocket Raccoon.

Detective Pikachu movie: What if we made all the pokemon weird and ugly
Me: *forking out fistfuls of money* Finally, finally

blog.name: mancan71
blog.title: Welcome!
blog.description: You can call me Manders if you like! I like anime, video games, Pokemon ,cute animals, and tons more! The awesome icon was made by https://starryeyedbfly.tumblr.com/

summary: What I’m expecting from the dectective pikachu movie
body:
What I’m expecting from the dectective pikachu movie

  • An appearance from 1 legendary Pokémon.
  • The detective being able to curse at least once
  • At least one political person as a villain with a persian
  • Based on how important that hat is to make the detective stand out from other pikachus there will be a reference to Indiana Jones where one of them will reach under a closing door to grab the hat that fell off him
  • The main character hilariously talking to another pikachu thinking it’s the detective, only for the detective to be like “wtf are you doing?” From behind him.
  • More sass from Mr. Mime
  • Jigglypuff being the “ex-girlfriend” or just female that hates the detective but they need her help anyway so the detective has to butter her up or apologize.
  • More pet talk towards the detective like the one woman.
  • Multiple people thinking Tim is crazy because is taking guidance from a pikachu/talking to a pikachu.

I’ll add more when I think of more.

  • The main character hilariously talking to another pikachu thinking it’s the detective, only for the detective to be like “wtf are you doing?” From behind him.
  • More sass from Mr. Mime
  • Jigglypuff being the “ex-girlfriend” or just female that hates the detective but they need her help anyway so the detective has to butter her up or apologize.
  • More pet talk towards the detective like the one woman.
